name: Red Superhot Action Shooter 3D
description:
It seems that there is no way out and you will be dead in a second…but it’s too early to ground arms. Feel like a brave warrior situated in a frontline of a furious battle and surrounded by powerful glass enemy with countless tons of ammunition. But you can control the flows of time and this ability gives you a chance to win and leave the battlefield sound and safe! Take your gun, involve your accuracy, find the target and kill these nasty assassins. Stop the enemy's aggression immediately. Shoot more and more to raise up your accuracy. Prove you are a professional soldier in Red Superhot Action Shooter 3D game!
Now you are surrounded by plenty faceless human-like crystalline creatures made of red glass just trying to kill you! But you have one advantage: time moves only when you’re moving, it means you have a great chance to hit the target and destroy your enemy like a true sniper! Use your shooting and fighting skills, to break free from this dangerous frontline and destroy all crystalline assassins! Stop the time to avoid the enemy, control it’s trajectories to get on target!
Red Superhot Action Shooter 3D features:
Dangerous battlefield filled with furious faceless assassins
Action shooter for all the fans of slow-mo games
Two different modes: kill crystalline thugs or stay alive as long as you can
Many challenging levels full of bloodless aggression
Easy and intuitive controls for all the ages
Tone of ammunitions for your choice
Red Superhot Action Shooter 3D is your chance to become a professional killer. Shatter your enemies to the small pieces with bullets and blades!
